While browsing, phantom duplicate tabs have appeared. They appear as the same exact tab as an existing one, but not selectable. I will attache a screenshot; note: I did not duplicate any tab manually.

Reproducible: Didn't try

comments.text: Can you please try to find a way to reproduce this behavior? Once we have the steps you should also run Firefox in Safe Mode (http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe Mode) without any extension installed.
comments.author: hskupin@gmail.com
